articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Leeds United vs Southampton in the Championship play-off final.
articles.title: Championship LIVE: Leeds United vs Southampton score, stats & text updates

articles.description: Kolkata Knight Riders win the Indian Premier League with a thumping eight-wicket win over Sunrisers Hyderabad in the final.
articles.title: IPL 2024 final result: Kolkata Knight Riders beat Sunrisers Hyderabad to win title

articles.description: Ferrari’s Charles Leclerc holds his nerve to convert pole position at his home Monaco Grand Prix into a controlled victory after a huge first-lap pile-up.
articles.title: Monaco Grand Prix: Charles Leclerc wins after Sergio Perez crash

articles.description: The parents of Grayson Murray say the golfer "took his own life", after the PGA Tour announced the American had died aged 30.
articles.title: Grayson Murray's parents say golfer took his own life

articles.description: Naomi Osaka avoids a first-round exit at the French Open with a 6-1 4-6 7-5 win over Italy's Lucia Bronzetti.
articles.title: French Open 2024 results: Naomi Osaka avoids first-round upset against Lucia Bronzetti

articles.description: England's second one-day international against Pakistan at Taunton is abandoned because of rain.
articles.title: England v Pakistan: Second ODI at Taunton abandoned because of rain

articles.description: Jack Draper loses to Dutch qualifier Jesper de Jong as the British campaign at the French Open gets off to an inauspicious start.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Jack Draper loses before Andy Murray plays Stan Wawrinka

articles.description: The future of manager Erik ten Hag will be discussed when senior figures at Manchester United begin conducting an end of season review this week.
articles.title: Manchester United: Erik ten Hag's future under discussion at club

articles.description: The Boston Celtics come from 18 points down to beat the Indiana Pacers and lead 3-0 in the Eastern Conference finals.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Boston Celtics beat Indiana Pacers to take 3-0 Eastern Conference finals lead

articles.description: England bowler Chris Jordan says Jofra Archer's first wicket on his international return gave him goosebumps.
articles.title: Jofra Archer: Wicket on England return gave me goosebumps, says Chris Jordan
